project_detail.title: Help an America’s Cup Supplier of Connected Objects to Reach More Profitable Industrial Markets
project_detail.description: The technology of water doping applies to any engine, and is largely unknown. The engine exhaust heat is used in a chamber to get a hot / cold self generating plasma

challenge.title: How can you contribute to the development of this technology at your local level ?

tasks.text: Share a contact that could be usefull
Apply to open a local branch
